buildings.name: Old GPU
buildings.description: Better for a museum than mining, but jokes on the GPU, you don't pay electricity, so it's basically free money! Yay!

buildings.name: Low-end GPU
buildings.description: Probably leftovers from a kid's old gaming rig, with this you can at least launch Minecraft without it crashing.

buildings.name: GPU
buildings.description: Finally some POWAH! This is considered the norm for gaming, that's plenty for mining!

buildings.name: High-end GPU
buildings.description: The new-ish Džífors 2080 card, shame that they released the 3000 series which is way faster.

buildings.name: Top-end GPU
buildings.description: Now we're talking! This is the highest offering from Džífors.

buildings.name: NASA GPU
buildings.description: Yes. This is used to power the robots and rocketships that go on different planets. I wonder how the store got this...
